articles.author: Anushree Madappa
articles.title: A Quiet Place: Day One Box Office (North America): Set To Break Franchise Preview Record Surpassing Quiet Place: Part II $4.8 Million Haul - Koimoi
articles.description: The new prequel, A Quiet Place: Day One helmed and written by Pig director Michael Sarnoski, will hit theaters on Friday, June 28, 2024.
articles.content:
